item.title: My First WP7 Apps on the Marketplace – Demotivator 7
item.description: Ok, so I mentioned that I am developing several Windows Phone 7 Apps, and I actually got one of them published on the marketplace! Most of the others are still unpublished yet though, either its going on review, or well, I just didn’t finish it. So, here is the one that got it to the marketplace. Demotivator 7, it’s a application to create demotivator posters from the pictures stored in the phone.
